com.jaunt.util
Interface Handler<T>

All Known Implementing Classes:
HandlerForBinary, HandlerForText
public interface Handler<T>

Interface for creating a content handler for handling content of a specific content-type (as opposed to having the parser handle the content).

Since:
0.9.7
Author:
Tom Cervenka

Handle the response data by reading from either the InputStream or the BufferedReader

Parameters:
ua - the UserAgent
response - contains meta-data of the the response.
inputStream - for content of the response to be read/processed.
